value: - The capital of Morocco; very relaxed and hassle-free, highlights include a 12th-century tower and minaret.

- This modern city by the sea is a starting point for visitors flying into the country. If you have the time, both the historical medina and the contemporary mosque (the second largest in the world) are well worth an afternoon.
